TopicTitle: Can't repair Gigantor XL Solar Array (mission).

Articles.Content:
I have the mission about repairing a Solar Array on a satellite in orbit of Kerbin. So I flew out there with Bill, who is an engineer and he has 4 repair kits in his inventory. But I don't see how should I repair the solar panel.

Do I need to have unlocked the Gigantor XL Solar Array?

Does the engineer need a certain XP level to be able to do repairs?

No of these are mentioned in the mission parameters so I do not expect any of these to be the issue.

BTW, I have no mods.

There was an old question about this on the forum, but I read it all and did not find help.

Edited November 28, 2022 by kiel814

Sorry for the dumb question but... is this the correct solar panel?

You're floating in front of a fully extended panel. Perhaps the one you need to repair is not this one, but rather a different solar panel, which is not currently extended (because it is broken)? Isn't there a mount visible on the opposite side of the truss in this picture? I'm not sure if it is another panel, but it well could be.

Oh my... I feel so dumb. I floated around the ship for like 20 minutes looking for a place to grab on to it and didn't even think of this.

Found it and fixed it. Now my kerbals can go back to watching TV thanks to you
